greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the least k such that sopfr(k) - sopf(k) = n.
link: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..500
formula: For p prime, a(p) = p^2 (see A001248).
program: a(n) = {my(k = 2); while (sopfr(k) - sopf(k) != n, k++; k;}
results.author: _Michel Marcus_, Dec 31 2016
